item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 1, 2025 at 3:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple Violated Antitrust Ruling, Judge Finds (399 points | 120 comments)
2. Mercury, the first commercial-scale diffusion language model (215 points | 78 comments)
3. Pwning the Ladybird Browser (83 points | 11 comments)
4. Linux Kernel Exploitation: Attack of the Vsock (149 points | 40 comments)

6. 108B Pixel Scan of Johannes Vermeer's Girl with a Pearl Earring (17 points | 8 comments)

8. Espressif's ESP32-C5 Is Now in Mass Production (96 points | 64 comments)
9. GroMo (YC W21) Is Hiring ( | hide)
10. Reversible computing with mechanical links and pivots (117 points | 57 comments)
11. Stockhausen: Sounds in Space (5 points | discuss)
12. Julia Parsons, U.S. Navy Code Breaker During World War II, Dies at 104 (66 points | 3 comments)
13. NotebookLM Audio Overviews are now available in over 50 languages (236 points | 78 comments)
14. Company built its own rail terminal in NYC to avoid relying on trucks (20 points | 2 comments)
15. Phi-4 Reasoning Models (50 points | 8 comments)

17. I created Perfect Wiki and reached $250k in annual revenue without investors (569 points | 329 comments)
18. Future of OSU Open Source Lab in Jeopardy (173 points | 54 comments)
19. Show HN: Convert Large CSV/XLSX to JSON or XML in Browser (4 points | discuss)
20. The best – but not good – way to limit string length (29 points | 21 comments)
21. Someone at YouTube needs glasses (1033 points | 562 comments)
22. Sycophancy in GPT-4o (497 points | 404 comments)
23. I Found Malware in a BeamNG Mod (46 points | 5 comments)
24. DeepSeek-Prover-V2 (313 points | 60 comments)
25. Jepsen: Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL 17.4 (575 points | 138 comments)
26. Show HN: ART – a new open-source RL framework for training agents (71 points | 8 comments)
27. Windows RDP lets you log-in using revoked passwords. Microsoft is ok with that (39 points | 6 comments)
28. You Wouldn't Download a Hacker News (376 points | 195 comments)
29. The True Size Of (228 points | 100 comments)
30. US defense secretary circumvents the official communications equipment (7 points | discuss)
